about_the_game:
Where there are rivers and lakes, there are people, where there are confrontations, there is me!
That's right, I am an narrator who is absolutely fair and impartial and does not favor any side! People are called the rivers and lakes-fun people!

"Jiang Hu Le Zi Ren" is a pixel simulation game. As the favorite fun player in Jiang Hu martial arts, he wanders in various thrilling duels, trying to explain everything you see (although no one asked you to do so) Do)
In a turn-based game, when the heroes are fighting to death, you need to provide them with commentary in a timely manner.
Every time you speak, you will be evaluated by the onlookers. After a complete commentary, the evaluation will turn into your prestige, and you can use prestige to strengthen your art of speaking so that you can speak more when you join in the fun in the future.
But it is also important to note that when you say something that is not very good, the two people who are busy fighting may also become angry at you. Once they are full of anger...please ask yourself for your blessings.
